attributes.action: Sack MP David Lammy for trying to ignore the EU Referendum, ignoring democracy.
attributes.background:
Taken from an article by Harry Yorke in the Telegraph

In a desperate attempt to override the referendum result delivered on Thursday, Labour MP David Lammy has called on Parliament to block Britain’s departure from the European Union.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
